EmailTemplate.description: This notification should go out to CSMOps to follow up with the CSM Acct Mgr on the reference status
EmailTemplate.name: Reference Program: Detach Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Detached Reference: {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name} which has a reference status of either nominated or active has been detached for an account. Please contact the former CS Account Manager to determine next steps.
Contact: {!Contact.Link}
